description.value: Medal, Bradley Wood Fete, 28-29 June 1855.  White metal, 36 mm diameter. Obverse showing South Devon Railway locomotive. Reverse, scene of building; Legend, Teignmouth & Dawlish Infirmary, Established 1848, supported by voluntary contributions.

details.transcription: BRADLEY WOOD FETE JUNE 28TH & 29TH./SOUTH DEVON RAILWAY
TEIGNMOUTH & DAWLISH INFIRMARY, SUPPORTED BY VOLUNTARY CONTRIBUTIONS./ESTABLISHED 1848
